sys_script_include.name: getEmailId

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.getEmailId</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getEmailId</name><script><![CDATA[var getEmailId = Class.create();
getEmailId.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	emailDetails: function(){
		var test = this.getParameter('sysparm_value');
		var x = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		x.addQuery('sys_id',test);
		x.query();
		if(x.next()){
			return x.email;
		}
	},
    type: 'getEmailId'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-10 04:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>8700873b973321108b9adb24a253afd3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getEmailId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8700873b973321108b9adb24a253afd3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-10 04:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
